headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Fortive’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Fortive’s third quarter was met with a positive market response, underscored by the company’s first full quarter operating as a streamlined entity following the Ralliance spin-off. Management attributed the quarter’s results to focused execution on organic growth and operational streamlining, including margin expansion initiatives and disciplined cost reductions. CEO Olumide Soroye highlighted the company’s progress in accelerating new product introductions, notably in its Fluke and ServiceChann

headline: CRUS Q2 Earnings & Sales Top, Diversification Strategy Gains Momentum
summary: Cirrus Logic tops estimate with fiscal Q2 2026 EPS of $2.83 on robust smartphone demand and expanding foothold in the PC market.

headline: Fortive Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend on its Common Stock and Announces Replenishment of its General Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: EVERETT, Wash., November 05, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.06 per share of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, payable on December 26, 2025 to common stockholders of record on November 28, 2025. content.title: Fortive Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend on its Common Stock and Announces Replenishment of its General Share Repurchase Authorization
content.summary: EVERETT, Wash., November 05, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.06 per share of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share, payable on December 26, 2025 to common stockholders of record on November 28, 2025.
